title: Start learning on the demo version to avoid putting yourself at risk

features.title: Start trading without risk
features.description: Get $10,000 in virtual dollars on a demo account and start practicing right of losing real money. Perfect for beginners and those who want to hone their skills.

features.title: Explore All Platform Features
features.description: Use the demo version to familiarize yourself with all the features and tools of our trading platform.
